sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO REMT9000 ( DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , SEVE_PAY_CLUT_MANGE_NUM , CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_BLGG_YR , CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_DIV_CD , ICNC_DT , RKFCD_DT , RSGTN_DT , PYMT_DT , EEPN_MNTH_ICM_2012_BFR , EEPN_MNTH_ICM_2013_AFT , ADD_MNTH_ICM_2012_BFR , ADD_MNTH_ICM_2013_AFT , RETRY_PAY_QNTY , FREE_DTY_RETRY_PAY_QNTY , ALPAY_TX_AMNT , LOC_INCM_TX_AMT , PERN_PYMT_SUM , SEVE_PAY_CTR_CLUT_NOTE_CTNT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR , AMCRR_CLUT_INSN_YN ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #systemkey# , (SELECT NVL(MAX(SEVE_PAY_CLUT_MANGE_NUM),0) + 1 FROM REMT9000 WHERE DPOB_CD = #dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY = #systemkey#) , #calcSevePayPsnBlggYr# , #calcSevePayPsnDivCd# , #icncDt# , #rkfcdDt# , #rsgtnDt# , #pymtDt# , #eepnMnthIcm2012Bfr# , #eepnMnthIcm2013Aft# , #addMnthIcm2012Bfr# , #addMnthIcm2013Aft# , #retryPayQnty# , #freeDtyRetryPayQnty# , #alpayTxAmnt# , #locIncmTxAmt# , #pernPymtSum# , #sevePayCtrClutNoteCtnt# , #kybdr# , #inptDt# , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , #revnDt# , #revnAddr# , #amcrrClutInsnYn# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE REMT9000 SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# , SEVE_PAY_CLUT_MANGE_NUM=#sevePayClutMangeNum# , CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_BLGG_YR=#calcSevePayPsnBlggYr# , CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_DIV_CD=#calcSevePayPsnDivCd# , ICNC_DT=#icncDt# , RKFCD_DT=#rkfcdDt# , RSGTN_DT=#rsgtnDt# , PYMT_DT=#pymtDt# , EEPN_MNTH_ICM_2012_BFR=#eepnMnthIcm2012Bfr# , EEPN_MNTH_ICM_2013_AFT=#eepnMnthIcm2013Aft# , ADD_MNTH_ICM_2012_BFR=#addMnthIcm2012Bfr# , ADD_MNTH_ICM_2013_AFT=#addMnthIcm2013Aft# , RETRY_PAY_QNTY=#retryPayQnty# , FREE_DTY_RETRY_PAY_QNTY=#freeDtyRetryPayQnty# , ALPAY_TX_AMNT=#alpayTxAmnt# , LOC_INCM_TX_AMT=#locIncmTxAmt# , PERN_PYMT_SUM=#pernPymtSum# , SEVE_PAY_CTR_CLUT_NOTE_CTNT=#sevePayCtrClutNoteCtnt# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=#inptDt# , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=#revnDt# , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# , AMCRR_CLUT_INSN_YN=#amcrrClutInsnYn# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND SEVE_PAY_CLUT_MANGE_NUM=#sevePayClutMangeNum#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM REMT9000 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND SEVE_PAY_CLUT_MANGE_NUM=#sevePayClutMangeNum#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , SYSTEMKEY , SEVE_PAY_CLUT_MANGE_NUM , CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_BLGG_YR , CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_DIV_CD , ICNC_DT , RKFCD_DT , RSGTN_DT , PYMT_DT , EEPN_MNTH_ICM_2012_BFR , EEPN_MNTH_ICM_2013_AFT , ADD_MNTH_ICM_2012_BFR , ADD_MNTH_ICM_2013_AFT , RETRY_PAY_QNTY , FREE_DTY_RETRY_PAY_QNTY , ALPAY_TX_AMNT , LOC_INCM_TX_AMT , PERN_PYMT_SUM , SEVE_PAY_CTR_CLUT_NOTE_CTNT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR , AMCRR_CLUT_INSN_YN FROM REMT9000 WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey# AND SEVE_PAY_CLUT_MANGE_NUM=#sevePayClutMangeNum#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT AA.DPOB_CD , AA.SYSTEMKEY , BB.HAN_NM, SUBSTR(BB.RESN_REGN_NUM,0,6)||'-'||SUBSTR(BB.RESN_REGN_NUM,7) AS RESN_REGN_NUM, BB.BUSIN_CD, BB.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD, fcBass0400CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,BB.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD,'2') AS CURR_AFFN_DEPT_NM, BB.REPBTY_BUSIN_DIV_CD, BB.TYP_OCCU_CD, fcBass0300CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,BB.TYP_OCCU_CD) AS TYP_OCCU_NM, BB.FRST_EMYMT_DT, BB.EMYMT_DIV_CD, fcBass0300CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,BB.EMYMT_DIV_CD) AS EMYMT_DIV_NM, BB.EMYMT_BGNN_DT, BB.EMYMT_END_DT, BB.HDOFC_CODTN_CD , AA.SEVE_PAY_CLUT_MANGE_NUM , AA.CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_BLGG_YR , AA.CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_DIV_CD , AA.CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_DIV_CD AS calcSevePayPsnDivCdcommCd , fcBass0300CDNM(AA.DPOB_CD,AA.CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_DIV_CD) AS calcSevePayPsnDivCdcommCdNm , AA.ICNC_DT , AA.RKFCD_DT , AA.RSGTN_DT , AA.PYMT_DT , AA.EEPN_MNTH_ICM_2012_BFR , AA.EEPN_MNTH_ICM_2013_AFT , AA.ADD_MNTH_ICM_2012_BFR , AA.ADD_MNTH_ICM_2013_AFT , AA.RETRY_PAY_QNTY , AA.FREE_DTY_RETRY_PAY_QNTY , AA.ALPAY_TX_AMNT , AA.SEVE_PAY_CTR_CLUT_NOTE_CTNT , AA.KYBDR , AA.INPT_DT , AA.INPT_ADDR , AA.ISMT , AA.REVN_DT , AA.REVN_ADDR , AA.LOC_INCM_TX_AMT , AA.PERN_PYMT_SUM , AA.AMCRR_CLUT_INSN_YN FROM REMT9000 AA, PSNL0100 BB WHERE AA.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD AND AA.SYSTEMKEY = BB.SYSTEMKEY AND AA.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
BB.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD=#deptCd#
BB.BUSIN_CD=#businCd#
AA.CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_DIV_CD=#calcSevePayPsnDivCd#
BB.EMYMT_DIV_CD=#emymtDivCd#
BB.TYP_OCCU_CD=#typOccuCd#
BB.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD = #dtilOccuInttnCd#
AA.CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_BLGG_YR = #calcSevePayPsnBlggYr#
AA.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
BB.HAN_NM LIKE '%' || #hanNm# || '%'
AA.SEVE_PAY_CLUT_MANGE_NUM=#sevePayClutMangeNum#
ORDER BY AA.DPOB_CD , AA.SYSTEMKEY , AA.SEVE_PAY_CLUT_MANGE_NUM
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM >= #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM (SELECT AA.DPOB_CD , AA.SYSTEMKEY , AA.SEVE_PAY_CLUT_MANGE_NUM FROM REMT9000 AA, PSNL0100 BB WHERE AA.DPOB_CD = BB.DPOB_CD AND AA.SYSTEMKEY = BB.SYSTEMKEY AND AA.DPOB_CD=#dpobCd#
BB.CURR_AFFN_DEPT_CD=#deptCd#
BB.BUSIN_CD=#businCd#
AA.CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_DIV_CD=#calcSevePayPsnDivCd#
BB.EMYMT_DIV_CD=#emymtDivCd#
BB.TYP_OCCU_CD=#typOccuCd#
BB.DTIL_OCCU_INTTN_CD = #dtilOccuInttnCd#
AA.CALC_SEVE_PAY_PSN_BLGG_YR = #calcSevePayPsnBlggYr#
AA.SYSTEMKEY=#systemkey#
BB.HAN_NM LIKE '%' || #hanNm# || '%'
AA.SEVE_PAY_CLUT_MANGE_NUM=#sevePayClutMangeNum#
)
